Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Prohibits day care centers from using or having for use toxic toys; defines toxic toys
Summary: Prohibits every child day care, child day care provider, child day care center, group family day care home, school age child care or family day care home from using or having for use unsafe children's products; defines unsafe children's products; authorizes civil penalties.
LawCode: Add Art 28-G §§495 - 495-d, Gen Bus L; amd §94-a, Exec L; amd §390, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, the executive law and the social services law, in relation to prohibiting every child day care, child day care provider, child day care center, group family day care home, school age child care or family day care home from using or having for use unsafe children's products, defining unsafe children's products and authorizing civil penalties
